title: 790: $100K BITCOIN BY CHRISTMAS NEEDS SMALL MIRACLE SAYS PLAN B!! 1 BTC SURPASSES 800K TURKISH LIRA!!
description:
Bitcoin bull Plan B, creator of the notorious stock-to-flow model updated us in regards to $100K BTC by Christmas.

"Bitcoin needs a small miracle for a 100K Christmas. Will I ditch S2F model if this does not happen? Nah, I actually like being at the lower bands. In fact I published the model at the lower bands in March 2019 with btc below 4K."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
